pli-tv-kd1:37.11.2_0: Na paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṁ vā saddhivihāriṁ vā abhisamācārikāya sikkhāya sikkhāpetuṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:37.12.2_0: Paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṁ vā saddhivihāriṁ vā abhisamācārikāya sikkhāya sikkhāpetuṁ ādibrahmacariyakāya sikkhāya vinetuṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:37.13.2_4: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso,
pli-tv-kd1:37.14.2_4: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso,
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena yo so aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṁ āropetvā taṁyeva titthāyatanaṁ saṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.2_0: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.4_2: aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṁ āropetvā taṁyeva titthāyatanaṁ saṅkanto,
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.5_2: aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:38.2.2_0: paṭhamaṁ kesamassuṁ ohārāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ
pli-tv-kd1:38.2.2_1: pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṁ vadehī’ti vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.1_2: aññatitthiyapubbena saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.2_0: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.3_0: Sohaṁ, bhante, saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.8_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati upasampadaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.9_0: So saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.10_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ saṅgho itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsaṁ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.2_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati upasampadaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.3_0: So saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.4_0: Saṅgho itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsaṁ deti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.5_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsassa dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.7_0: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāso.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.8_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.1_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti, evaṁ anārādhako.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo atikālena gāmaṁ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.6.1_2: aññatitthiyapubbo yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni,
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.1_3: tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa avaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho,
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.1_4: buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.2_0: Yassa vā pana titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti,
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.2_1: tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho,
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.2_2: buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.4_0: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo anārādhako hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.5_0: Evaṁ anārādhako kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo āgato na upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.8.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo nātikālena gāmaṁ pavisati nātidivā paṭikkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.9.1_2: aññatitthiyapubbo yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni,
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.1_3: tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa avaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho,
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.1_4: buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.2_0: Yassa vā pana titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti,
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.2_1: tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho,
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.2_2: buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.4_0: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.5_0: Evaṁ ārādhako kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo āgato upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.1_0: Sace, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo naggo āgacchati, upajjhāyamūlakaṁ cīvaraṁ pariyesitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.2_0: Sace acchinnakeso āgacchati, saṅgho apaloketabbo bhaṇḍukammāya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.3_0: Ye te, bhikkhave, aggikā jaṭilakā, te āgatā upasampādetabbā, na tesaṁ parivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.7_0: Imāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ñātīnaṁ āveṇikaṁ parihāraṁ dammī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena magadhesu pañca ābādhā ussannā honti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.3_0: Manussā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhā jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.6_0: rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.1_1: bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.6_0: Tattha bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahissanti, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.7_0: Atha kho te manussā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāciṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.9_0: Te bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahiṁsu jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bahū gilāne bhikkhū upaṭṭhahantā yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharanti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.3.3_0: Jīvakopi komārabhacco bahū gilāne bhikkhū tikicchanto aññataraṁ rājakiccaṁ parihāpesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.1_0: Aññataropi puriso pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.3_3: rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.5_0: “Sabbaṁ sāpateyyañca te, ācariya, hotu, ahañca te dāso;
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.7_2: rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho,
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.4_0: Tattha bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahissanti, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchissati.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.6_0: Atha kho so puriso bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.8_0: Taṁ bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahiṁsu, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.10_0: Addasā kho jīvako komārabhacco taṁ purisaṁ vibbhantaṁ, disvāna taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.14_0: Atha kho so puriso jīvakassa komārabhaccassa etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.2_0: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.3_0: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.5_0: “sādhu, bhante, ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.2_0: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.2_1: uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccanto kupito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.2_0: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro senānāyake mahāmatte āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.4_0: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho senānāyakā mahāmattā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccassosuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.1_0: Atha kho abhiññātānaṁ abhiññātānaṁ yodhānaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.2_0: “mayaṁ kho yuddhābhinandino gacchantā pāpañca karoma, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavāma.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.3_0: Kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.5_0: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.6_0: Sace kho mayaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyāma,
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.6_1: evaṁ mayaṁ pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.7_0: Atha kho te yodhā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāciṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.2_0: “kiṁ nu kho, bhaṇe, itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca yodhā na dissantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.3_0: “Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca, sāmi, yodhā bhikkhūsu pabbajitā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.6_0: Senānāyakā mahāmattā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.7_0: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vohārike mahāmatte pucchi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.8_0: “yo, bhaṇe, rājabhaṭaṁ pabbājeti, kiṁ so pasavatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.1_0: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.5_0: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā rājabhaṭaṁ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.7_0: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.7_1: uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.8_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena coro aṅgulimālo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhajabandhaṁ coraṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.6_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena anuññātaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.2_0: “ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.3_0: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso corikaṁ katvā kārāya baddho hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.5_0: So kāraṁ bhinditvā palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.7_0: ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.8_0: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.10_0: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.11_0: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kārabhedakaṁ coraṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso corikaṁ katvā palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.2_0: So ca rañño antepure likhito hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.9_0: Anuññātaṁ raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti,
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.11_0: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.12_0: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā likhitakaṁ coraṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:44.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso kasāhato katadaṇḍakammo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:44.1.3_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kasāhataṁ katadaṇḍakammaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:45.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso lakkhaṇāhato katadaṇḍakammo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:45.1.3_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā lakkhaṇāhataṁ katadaṇḍakammaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso iṇāyiko palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.8_0: ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.9_0: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.13_0: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā iṇāyikaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro dāso palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.6_2: anuññātaṁ raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti,
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.8_0: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.9_0: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dāsaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro kammārabhaṇḍu mātāpitūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.1.2_0: Atha kho tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitaro taṁ kammārabhaṇḍuṁ vicinantā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhū pucchiṁsu—
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.1_0: Atha kho tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitaro taṁ kammārabhaṇḍuṁ vicinantā bhikkhūsu pabbajitaṁ disvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.3_0: Jānaṁyeva āhaṁsu—‘na jānāmā’ti, passaṁyeva āhaṁsu—‘na passāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitūnaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.6_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe sattarasavaggiyā dārakā sahāyakā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.4_0: “kena nu kho upāyena upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.6_1: evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya,
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.8_0: “sace kho upāli lekhaṁ sikkhissati, aṅguliyo dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.9_1: evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya,
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.1_0: “sace kho upāli gaṇanaṁ sikkhissati, urassa dukkho bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.2_1: evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya,
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.4_0: “sace kho upāli rūpaṁ sikkhissati, akkhīni dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.5_0: Ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā,
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.6_0: Sace kho upāli samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya,
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.6_1: evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya,
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.1_0: Assosi kho upālidārako mātāpitūnaṁ imaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.2_0: Atha kho upālidārako yena te dārakā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te dārake etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.4_0: “Sace kho tvaṁ, ayya, pabbajissasi, evaṁ mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.5_0: Atha kho te dārakā ekamekassa mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.6_0: no ce bhavissati yāgu vā bhattaṁ vā khādanīyaṁ vā, piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjissathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.7_0: Evampi kho te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā rodantiyeva “yāguṁ detha,
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.1_0: Assosi kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya dārakasaddaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.5_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū jānaṁ ūnavīsativassaṁ puggalaṁ upasampādentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.8_0: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā jānaṁ ūnavīsativassaṁ puggalaṁ upasampādessanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.1_2: puggalo akkhamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ duruttānaṁ
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.1_3: durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.2_2: puggalo khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.2_3: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.3_0: Netaṁ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṁ vā bhiyyobhāvāya …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataraṁ kulaṁ ahivātakarogena kālaṅkataṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.3_0: Te bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā ekatova piṇḍāya caranti.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.4_0: Atha kho so dārako pituno bhikkhāya dinnāya upadhāvitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.10_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.11_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato ānandassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ ahivātakarogena kālaṅkataṁ hoti,
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.2_0: Te porāṇakena āciṇṇakappena bhikkhū passitvā upadhāvanti.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.9_0: Kena nu kho upāyena ime dārakā na vinasseyyun”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.10_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.11_0: “Ussahanti pana te, ānanda, dārakā kāke uḍḍāpetun”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.13_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:52.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa dve sāmaṇerā honti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tattheva rājagahe vassaṁ vasi, tattha hemantaṁ, tattha gimhaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.3_0: “āhundarikā samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtiyānaṁ disā andhakārā, na imesaṁ disā pakkhāyantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.4_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.5_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.2.5_1: bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā avāpuraṇaṁ ādāya anupariveṇiyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ārocesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.2_0: “bhagavatā, āvuso ānanda, paññattaṁ dasavassāni nissāya vatthuṁ, dasavassena nissayaṁ dātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.4_0: Sace amhākaṁ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissanti, mayampi gamissāma;
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.5_0: no ce amhākaṁ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissanti, mayampi na gamissāma.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā ogaṇena bhikkhusaṅghena dakkhiṇāgiriṁ cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā punadeva rājagahaṁ paccāgacchi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.4_0: “kiṁ nu kho, ānanda, tathāgato ogaṇena bhikkhusaṅghena dakkhiṇāgiriṁ cārikaṁ pakkanto”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.7_2: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena pañcavassāni nissāya vatthuṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.2_0: Na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti na asekkhena samādhikkhandhena,
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.2_1: na asekkhena paññākkhandhena na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena na asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.4_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.5_0: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti asekkhena samādhikkhandhena.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.9_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.1_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.2_0: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.4_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.5_0: Saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, upaṭṭhitassati hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.1_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.4_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.1_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.2_4: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso—
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.4_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.5_4: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso—
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.9.1_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.9.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.9.4_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.9.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.10.1_0: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.10.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.10.4_0: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.10.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.11.1_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.11.2_0: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti, ūnapañcavasso hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.11.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.11.4_0: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.11.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.12.1_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.12.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.12.4_0: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.12.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.1_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.2_4: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso,
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.3_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.4_0: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.5_4: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso,
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.6_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabban”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena kapilavatthu tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.2_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena kapilavatthu tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena suddhodanassa sakkassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.5_0: Atha kho rāhulamātā devī rāhulaṁ kumāraṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.1_0: Atha kho rāhulo kumāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato purato, aṭṭhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.4_0: Atha kho rāhulo kumāro bhagavantaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.8_0: “tena hi tvaṁ, sāriputta, rāhulaṁ kumāraṁ pabbājehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.4_0: paṭhamaṁ kesamassuṁ ohārāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.4_1: pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṁ vadehī’ti vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.14_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇerapabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto rāhulaṁ kumāraṁ pabbājesi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.2_0: Atha kho suddhodano sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho suddhodano sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.1_0: “Bhagavati me, bhante, pabbajite anappakaṁ dukkhaṁ ahosi, tathā nande, adhimattaṁ rāhule.
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.3_0: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā ananuññātaṁ mātāpitūhi puttaṁ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā suddhodanaṁ sakkaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.2_0: Atha kho suddhodano sakko bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.2_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa santike dārakaṁ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.12_2: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena ekena dve sāmaṇere upaṭṭhāpetuṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.12_3: yāvatake vā pana ussahati ovadituṁ anusāsituṁ tāvatake upaṭṭhāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.2_0: “kati nu kho amhākaṁ sikkhāpadāni, kattha ca amhehi sikkhitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.4_0: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṁ dasa sikkhāpadāni, tesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhituṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.15_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṁ imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni, imesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāmaṇerā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharanti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.3_0: “kathañhi nāma sāmaṇerā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.5_0: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṁ kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.11_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṁ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṁ sabbaṁ saṅghārāmaṁ āvaraṇaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.6_0: Sāmaṇerā ārāmaṁ pavisituṁ alabhamānā pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipi, titthiyesupi saṅkamanti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.10_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yattha vā vasati, yattha vā paṭikkamati, tattha āvaraṇaṁ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṁ mukhadvārikaṁ āhāraṁ āvaraṇaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.2_0: Manussā yāgupānampi saṅghabhattampi karontā sāmaṇere evaṁ vadenti—
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.9_0: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā sāmaṇerānaṁ mukhadvārikaṁ āhāraṁ āvaraṇaṁ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū upajjhāye anāpucchā sāmaṇerānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.3_0: “kathaṁ nu kho amhākaṁ sāmaṇerā na dissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū amhe anāpucchā amhākaṁ sāmaṇerānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:59.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sāmaṇere apalāḷenti.
pli-tv-kd1:59.1.2_0: Therā sāmaṁ dantakaṭṭhampi mukhodakampi gaṇhantā kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd1:60.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa kaṇṭako nāma sāmaṇero kaṇṭakiṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ dūsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:60.1.16_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṁ sāmaṇeraṁ nāsetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro paṇḍako bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.2_0: So dahare dahare bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.5_0: “nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.6_0: So bhikkhūhi apasādito mahante mahante moḷigalle sāmaṇere upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.9_0: “nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.10_0: So sāmaṇerehi apasādito hatthibhaṇḍe assabhaṇḍe upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.15_0: Yepi imesaṁ na paṇḍakā, tepi ime paṇḍake dūsenti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.17_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ hatthibhaṇḍānaṁ assabhaṇḍānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.18_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.19_0: “Paṇḍako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño sukhumālo hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.2_0: Atha kho tassa purāṇakulaputtassa khīṇakolaññassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.3_0: “ahaṁ kho sukhumālo, na paṭibalo anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigantuṁ, adhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.4_0: Kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena sukhañca jīveyyaṁ, na ca kilameyyan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.5_0: Atha kho tassa purāṇakulaputtassa khīṇakolaññassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.7_0: Yannūnāhaṁ sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvaseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.2.1_0: Atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni
pli-tv-kd1:62.2.1_1: vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhū abhivādeti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.1_0: Atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.4_0: “Theyyasaṁvāsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.5_0: Titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro nāgo nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.3_0: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena nāgayoniyā ca parimucceyyaṁ khippañca manussattaṁ paṭilabheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.5_0: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.6_0: Sace kho ahaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.1_0: Atha kho so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ paccantime vihāre paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.4_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.5_0: Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṁ okkami.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.6_0: Sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṁ pavisissāmīti kavāṭaṁ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṁ vihāraṁ ahinā puṇṇaṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.4_0: “Ayaṁ, āvuso, sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.5_0: Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena paṭibujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.10_0: Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā taṁ nāgaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.3_1: tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṁ upavasa,
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.4_0: Atha kho so nāgo aviruḷhidhammo kirāhaṁ imasmiṁ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno vissaraṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.3_0: Yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, yadā ca vissaṭṭho niddaṁ okkamati—
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.5_0: Tiracchānagato, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro māṇavako mātaraṁ jīvitā voropesi.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.2_0: So tena pāpakena kammena aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.4_0: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.6_0: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.7_0: Sace kho ahaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.7_1: evāhaṁ imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.1_0: Atha kho so māṇavako bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.3_0: “pubbepi kho, āvuso upāli, nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhūsu pabbajito.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.5_0: Atha kho so māṇavako āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.8_0: “mātughātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro māṇavako pitaraṁ jīvitā voropesi.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.2_0: So tena pāpakena kammena aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.4_0: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.6_0: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā,
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.6_1: sace kho ahaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.6_2: evāhaṁ imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.7_0: Atha kho so māṇavako bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.9_0: “pubbepi kho, āvuso upāli, nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhūsu pabbajito.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.11_0: Atha kho so māṇavako āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.14_0: “Pitughātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.2_0: Antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā ekacce bhikkhū acchindiṁsu, ekacce bhikkhū haniṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.3_0: Sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā ekacce core aggahesuṁ, ekacce corā palāyiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.4_0: Ye te palāyiṁsu te bhikkhūsu pabbajiṁsu, ye te gahitā te vadhāya oniyyanti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.1_0: Addasaṁsu kho te palāyitvā pabbajitā te core vadhāya oniyyamāne, disvāna evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.2_0: “sādhu kho mayaṁ palāyimhā, sacā ca mayaṁ gayheyyāma, mayampi evameva haññeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.5_0: Atha kho te pabbajitā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.8_0: Arahantaghātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.2_0: Antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā ekaccā bhikkhuniyo acchindiṁsu, ekaccā bhikkhuniyo dūsesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.3_0: Sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā ekacce core aggahesuṁ, ekacce corā palāyiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.4_0: Ye te palāyiṁsu, te bhikkhūsu pabbajiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.5_0: Ye te gahitā, te vadhāya oniyyanti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.6_0: Addasaṁsu kho te palāyitvā pabbajitā te core vadhāya oniyyamāne, disvāna evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.7_0: “sādhu kho mayaṁ palāyimhā, sacā ca mayaṁ gayheyyāma, mayampi evameva haññeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.10_0: Atha kho te pabbajitā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.12_0: “Bhikkhunidūsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.13_0: Saṅghabhedako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.14_0: Lohituppādako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:68.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro ubhatobyañjanako bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:68.1.4_0: “Ubhatobyañjanako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupajjhāyakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saṅghena upajjhāyena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gaṇena upajjhāyena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇḍakupajjhāyena upasampādenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:70.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū apattakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū acīvarakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū apattacīvarakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena pattena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena cīvarena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena pattacīvarena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:71.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū hatthacchinnaṁ pabbājenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū alajjīnaṁ nissayaṁ denti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū alajjīnaṁ nissāya vasanti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.12_0: ‘na alajjīnaṁ nissayo dātabbo, na alajjīnaṁ nissāya vatthabban’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.13_0: Kathaṁ nu kho mayaṁ jāneyyāma lajjiṁ vā alajjiṁ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.15_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catūhapañcāhaṁ āgametuṁ yāva bhikkhusabhāgataṁ jānāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.5_0: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo addhānamaggappaṭipanno, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.7_2: addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā nissayaṁ alabhamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.4_0: Atha kho tassa gilānassa bhikkhuno etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.7_0: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo gilāno, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.9_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā nissayaṁ alabhamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.1_0: Atha kho tassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa bhikkhuno etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.4_0: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo, ayañca bhikkhu gilāno, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.6_2: gilānupaṭṭhākena bhikkhunā nissayaṁ alabhamānena yāciyamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu araññe viharati.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.2_0: Tassa ca tasmiṁ senāsane phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.8_2: āraññikena bhikkhunā phāsuvihāraṁ sallakkhentena nissayaṁ alabhamānena anissitena vatthuṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.9_0: yadā patirūpo nissayadāyako āgacchissati, tadā tassa nissāya vasissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato mahākassapassa upasampadāpekkho hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmato ānandassa santike dūtaṁ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.5_0: “nāhaṁ ussahāmi therassa nāmaṁ gahetuṁ, garu me thero”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato mahākassapassa dve upasampadāpekkhā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulānaṁ therānaṁ upasampadāpekkhā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo gabbhavīso upasampanno ahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.6_0: Upasampanno nu khomhi, nanu kho upasampanno”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:76.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena upasampannā dissanti kuṭṭhikāpi gaṇḍikāpi kilāsikāpi sosikāpi apamārikāpi.
pli-tv-kd1:76.1.3_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, upasampādentena terasa antarāyike dhamme pucchituṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ananusiṭṭhe upasampadāpekkhe antarāyike dhamme pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.2_0: Upasampadāpekkhā vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.4_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ anusāsitvā pacchā antarāyike dhamme pucchitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.2_0: Upasampadāpekkhā tatheva vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.4_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekamantaṁ anusāsitvā saṅghamajjhe antarāyike dhamme pucchituṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.8_0: ‘ayaṁ te patto, ayaṁ saṅghāṭi, ayaṁ uttarāsaṅgo, ayaṁ antaravāsako.
pli-tv-kd1:76.4.2_0: Duranusiṭṭhā upasampadāpekkhā vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.4.6_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena anusāsitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.5.7_0: attanā vā attānaṁ sammannitabbaṁ, parena vā paro sammannitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:76.5.12_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ itthannāmaṁ anusāseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.6.5_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṁ anusāseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.1_0: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā upasampadāpekkho upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.3_0: Yaṁ jātaṁ taṁ saṅghamajjhe pucchante santaṁ atthīti vattabbaṁ, asantaṁ natthīti vattabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.4_0: Mā kho vitthāyi, mā kho maṅku ahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.9_0: Ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā upasampadaṁ yācāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.11_0: Ullumpatu maṁ, bhante, saṅgho anukampaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.13_0: Ullumpatu maṁ, bhante, saṅgho anukampaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.15_0: Ullumpatu maṁ, bhante, saṅgho anukampaṁ upādāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.4_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ itthannāmaṁ antarāyike dhamme puccheyyanti?
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.5_0: Suṇasi, itthannāma, ayaṁ te saccakālo bhūtakālo.
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.7_0: Santaṁ atthīti vattabbaṁ, asantaṁ natthīti vattabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.4_0: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.5_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ upasampādeyya itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.3_0: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.5_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.4_0: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.6_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.11_0: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.13_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.16_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.5_0: saṅghabhattaṁ, uddesabhattaṁ, nimantanaṁ, salākabhattaṁ, pakkhikaṁ, uposathikaṁ, pāṭipadikaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.9_0: khomaṁ, kappāsikaṁ, koseyyaṁ, kambalaṁ, sāṇaṁ, bhaṅgaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ upasampādetvā ekakaṁ ohāya pakkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.2_0: So pacchā ekakova āgacchanto antarāmagge purāṇadutiyikāya samāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.8_0: So tassā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevitvā cirena agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.3_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, upasampādetvā dutiyaṁ dātuṁ, cattāri ca akaraṇīyāni ācikkhituṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.4_0: Upasampannena bhikkhunā methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo, antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.5_0: Yo bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.6_0: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso sīsacchinno abhabbo tena sarīrabandhanena jīvituṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.7_0: evameva bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.1_0: Upasampannena bhikkhunā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ na ādātabbaṁ, antamaso tiṇasalākaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.2_0: Yo bhikkhu pādaṁ vā pādārahaṁ vā atirekapādaṁ vā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati,
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.3_0: Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāya;
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.4_0: evameva bhikkhu pādaṁ vā pādārahaṁ vā atirekapādaṁ vā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.1_0: Upasampannena bhikkhunā sañcicca pāṇo jīvitā na voropetabbo, antamaso kunthakipillikaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.2_0: Yo bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeti,
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.3_0: Seyyathāpi nāma puthusilā dvedhā bhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti;
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.4_0: evameva bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropetvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.1_0: Upasampannena bhikkhunā uttarimanussadhammo na ullapitabbo, antamaso ‘suññāgāre abhiramāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.2_0: Yo bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati jhānaṁ vā vimokkhaṁ vā samādhiṁ vā samāpattiṁ vā maggaṁ vā phalaṁ vā,
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.3_0: Seyyathāpi nāma tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruḷhiyā;
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.4_0: evameva bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.2_0: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.4_0: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.5_0: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.2.8_0: No ce passati, labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.2_0: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.18_0: No ce paṭikaroti labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.2_0: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.18_0: No ce paṭinissajjati, labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.80_0: Yo so añño ca naggo ca,
